answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!I would suggest you look for generalized causes like Vit D or B12 deficiency, hormone imbalances, calcium deficiency, hypothyroidism, parathyroid disease, diabetes and maybe even anemia. There is a chance you have deep vein thrombosis too.Hope this helps. I think you should discuss these possibilities with your doctor. It is difficult to comment beyond this without examining. A comprehensive investigation is required keeping all the points in mind. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: Off & on for a few months I have been experiencing the following symptoms:•	Tight, swollen & painful legs.  Mostly in calves but also in quads & around knees.•	Feel like everything I eat makes me gain weight, yet I get full very quickly & often get overly full from normal amounts of food (although sometimes I can still eat a lot & not feel like this-- as I said, the symptoms come & go).•	Weight gain, yet my eating & exercise habits have not drastically changed.  I have maintained the same weight within about 5 lbs for approximately 4 years through exercise (about every other day I run &/or do other cardio and light weights) and mainly very healthy eating with normal splurges on the weekends.•	General loss of appetite-- RARELY feel hungry anymore.  And can go hours (8-10) without food and not be starving.•	Frequent back pain.  Often wake up with intense pain, but since this happens on different beds I've ruled out that it's my mattress.  Also occurs sometimes after eating and lately, always occurs after a big and/or unhealthy meal.  Mostly on lower right side but up top as well.•	It seems to take forever for me to digest food.  I know that if I eat a large dinner I will wake up full & bloated.  I also know that eating a large dinner will without question give me intense back pain while sleeping.•	Easily get bloated and feel bloated all over ENTIRE body, even my feet.•	Terrible acne-- worse than in high school when I 1st got acne.•	Increase in breast size.•	Stopped taking birth control last November because I thought some of these symptoms were caused by the pill.I would love some answers because these symptoms are making me more & more uncomfortable.
title: Tight calves, back pain, bloating etc
